hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/loaded
hooks.description: Triggers an action when the plugin is fully loaded.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/template_after_include
hooks.description: Fires an Action after including the template file.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Complete path to include the PHP File.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/template_after_include:\{$hook_name\}
hooks.description: Fires an Action for a given template name after including the template file.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Complete path to include the PHP File.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/template_before_include
hooks.description: Fires an Action before including the template file

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Complete path to include the PHP File

hooks.description: Fires an Action for a given template name before including the template file,

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Complete path to include the PHP File.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/bulk_actions_map
hooks.description: Filters the bulk actions map included in the GV group.

parameters.name: map
parameters.description: List of objects for the edit actions.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/edit_action/supported_form_meta
hooks.description: Filter to allow short-circuiting the modal rendering.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/email_action/get_field
hooks.description: Filter any field before returning it's values.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/email_action/get_field:\{$field->id\}
hooks.description: Filter of a specific field before returning it.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/email_action/get_fields
hooks.description: Filter to allow short-circuiting the modal rendering.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/hide_hidden_inputs
hooks.description: Allows showing inputs that aren't currently displayed in the form.

parameters.name: hide_hidden_inputs
parameters.description: True: hide inputs hidden by the form. False: show inputs hidden by the form.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/is_truthy_strings
hooks.description: Provides an opportunity to modify strings that will be deemed to evaluate to true.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/modal/verify-nonce
hooks.description: Filter whether to verify the nonce passed to the modal loading.

parameters.name: should_verify_nonce
parameters.description: Whether to verify the nonce passed to the modal loading.

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: The nonce passed to the modal loading.

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/pre_modal_render

hooks.name: gk/gravityactions/template_vars_get
hooks.description: Allows filtering the the getting of template vars variables, also short circuiting.

parameters.description: The value that will be filtered.

parameters.description: Default value if the search finds nothing.

parameters.name: is_local
parameters.description: Use the Local or Global template vars.
